title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 §§ 154-2.21 - State Motor Carrier Advisory Council
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 §§ 154-2.21 - State Motor Carrier Advisory Council

State Regulations

The State Motor Carrier Advisory Council established by
chapter 656 of the Laws of 1993 is housed within the department. Correspondence
shall be addressed to the Advisory Counsel, Department of Transportation, Building 5, Room 311, Averill W. Harriman State Office Building Campus, Albany, NY 12232. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
§§
154-2.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
